attributes.action: Scrap the nurses annual NMC registration fee : stop the fee (£120)
attributes.background: Nurses are asked to register on the NMC register which costs £120 per year. Without this they cannot work. Nurses wages are low in comparison to other skilled workers and so the extra burden of having to pay the registration fee is unfair and unnecessary.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure whether you want to scrap the fee entirely or whether you feel that the £120 cost is too high and would like it lowered. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
